After the last lost onslaught,
Supreme Leader walked in thought.

How do we make them great again?
Yes, let's make them spew fiery rain!

And if the crews get cooked inside?
Then they burn and die with pride!

I was a little mole when I entered the Liberator Factory, the golden coupon in one hand and the Supreme Leader's hand in the other! He made me a slave there for thirty-two years! The machines took my arm and eyes. Please, give a crumb of bread to a hungry beggar!
